owner.name: Apache Software Foundation
owner.comment: License Under the Apache License, Version 2.0

technicalRequirement.name: TR1_3DScan_get3DObject
technicalRequirement.description: The get3DObject is exposed over a REST endpoint. The return data is a JavaScript code which could be integrated in any web page to display the 3D file.
technicalRequirement.rational: To have the possibility to display the Object in the visualizer taking as input the 3D Object File based on JavaScript

technologyConstraints.name: TC_3DScan_get3DObject
technologyConstraints.description: The 3Dscan ME must run in a servlet container such as Tomcat, and should not depend on a particular operating system
technologyConstraints.rational: To have the possibility to deploy this ME in any java-based technology stack

technologyConstraints.name: TC2_3DScan_get3DObject
technologyConstraints.description: The 3D File with stl extension must be serialized using text/JavaScript serialization and based on three.js library
technologyConstraints.rational: To have the possibility to display the 3D File in any web page using <script> tag

Performance.description: Maximum time required to initialize a new instance
